The community in this game is absolute dog shit. Its a good game but the players and how steam has handled the community ruins the game. Tried to refund after playing with prime for 2 hours and was denied. Fuck steam and valve. How can u not refund someone who has had a bad experience on your own product.

This game is delightful to play. Counter-Strike is like the OG FPS game, and I remember playing CS 1.6 as a child. The mechanics of this game are unique, game modes are excellent, and it isn't pay to win at all. You can buy skins with money, but that can't affect your gameplay by 1%. Also, there is a significant problem in the game, which is cheaters. Cheaters can ruin your experience, but if you are lucky enough and maybe buy Prime, you can have a fantastic time and get addicted to this game.

10/10
